{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RT-AC68 |revision=P (v2) |series=AC1900 |upc=886227672462 |ean=0886227672462 |asin=B00PZX26NQ |newegg=N82E16833320228 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WG9117E |manuf_rev=AC33 (1-ASU) |availability=limited |price=199.99 |est_release_date=11/22/2014 |fcc_date=08/12/2014 |fcc_id=MSQ-RTAC68UV2 |ic_id=3568A-RTAC68UV2 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=1.75 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4709A0;BCM4709A0KFEBG;TT1348;P10;E90YZ.7-01;Z1A; |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G100TFI00 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M15F2G16128A-BDB |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4360;BCM4360KMLG;TE1403;P20;348143;3W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4360;BCM4360KMLG;TE1403;P20;348143;3W; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6649E;;3;,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SKY85402-11;SKY, 85402, 11;;3; |flags=AiCloud support, AiMesh |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux;2.6.36.4;brcmarm; |tp_firmware=Asuswrt-Merlin, Tomato (Shibby), FreshTomato |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ASUS, ASUS_5G |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS$,,, ^ASUS 5G$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=10:C3:78 |oui_eth=10:C3:78 }}
:• '''1300''' Mbps max PHY rate for the 80MHz wide 5GHz channel, :• '''600''' Mbps max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''1900 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Wireless-AC1900 Dual-Band Gigabit Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.asus.com/Networking/RTAC68P/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=ASUS|model=RTAC68P}} {{WiFiCert|WFA19421|08/29/2013}} :This certification also applies to the ''RT-AC68R'' ===FCC Info=== Multiple manufacturers are noted within the [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTAC68UV2 FCC] test report *[[Askey]] ''Technology'' (Jiangsu) Ltd. *[[Compal]] ''Networking (KunShan)'' Co., LTD. ([[Arcadyan]]) :The FCC label indicates the int. [[Arcadyan]] model :is ''WG9117EAC33 1-ASU'' ([http://www.arcadyan.com/contentPage.aspx?type=product-detail&L2id=153&prod2id=180 WG9117GAC]) *The ''ASUS'' logo, "RT-AC68U-V2", "REV 2.20" and "HannStar KMV-4" :is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :'''CPU''': [[Broadcom]] BCM4709A0KFEBG (TT1348;P10;E90YZ.7-01;Z1A) :'''WLAN''': 2x [[Broadcom]] BCM4360KMLG (TE1403;P20;348143;3W) :'''Flash''': ''Spansion'' S34ML01G100TFI00 (411BB132;A12;SPANSION) :'''RAM''': ''ESMT'' M15F2G16128A-BDB (KPF1;T30L901;341) :'''Quarz''': 40MHz (X3, X4), 25MHz (X2) :'''OUI''': 10:C3:78 ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32609-asus-rt-ac68p-dual-band-wireless-ac1900-gigabit-router-reviewed ''ASUS RT-AC68P Wireless-AC1900 Gigabit Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=940334 On '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[http://forums.smallnetbuilder.com/showthread.php?t=20297 On '''SmallNetBuilder''' forums] :[http://paste.debian.net/128628/ Asus RT-AC68P boot log] ====cpu info====

:[http://www.skyworksinc.com/uploads/documents/SKY85402_11_202120F.pdf SKY85402 Datasheet] ===Other=== *[http://press.asus.com/asus-announces-next-generation-wi-fi-devices-and-new-portable-projector/ ''ASUS Announces Next-Generation Wi-Fi Devices'' on '''ASUS''' ''Press Release''] *[http://www.bestbuy.com/site/asus-wirelessac1900-dual-band-gigabit-wireless-router/8448381.p?id=1219334566012&skuId=8448381 ''Asus RT-AC68P Dual-band Wireless-AC1900 Gigabit Router'' on '''BestBuy'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/31778-broadcom-announces-beefed-up-socs-to-power-up-draft-80211ac-products ''Broadcom Announces Beefed-Up SoCs To Power Up Draft 802.11ac Products''
on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] __NOTOC__
